Review.Titre: Products never delivered 100% or…
Review.Contenu: Products never delivered 100% or on-time. Once you pay for something, you go down a rabbit-hole of constant upgrades. Programs that were supposed to be lifetime and closed off forever, keep popping up again, but 5X more expensive, and if you don't "upgrade", you lose your previous "lifetime" access... selective answers on customers questions/concerns and if you dare to ask, well you get kicked out.

Review.Titre: What Went wrong was I cancel the…
Review.Contenu: What Went wrong was I cancel the account it said 360 day guarantee I paid 500 bucks for it and you’re now you’re telling me I don’t get any money back what happened to the 360 day guarantee I want my 500 bucks back

Review.Titre: This company is a STAGE for dishonesty

I was promised a prompt refund 31 days ago and there has been absolutely no effort to fulfill it- despite phone and email communication with this company.If you see this review in time...BEWARE.Save yourself the trouble of dealing with the scam.

Review.Titre: ESTAGE is a Game Changer!
Review.Contenu: ESTAGE is a Game Changer!ESTAGE is so much more than just a website builder. As the company continues to release more and more updates, with ESTAGE you will be able to incorporate many different modules that are built into the platform where other builders would require you to purchase a 3rd party solution. With ESTAGE you will be able to create a pixel perfect design for your website, hub, funnels, landing pages, and more. The amount of control that you have of creating your project feels virtually limitless. The ESTAGE support team is the best! They respond to you very quickly and always find a way to help you resolve your problem. You will not find another builder that can do all the things ESTAGE does. I highly recommend that you get ESTAGE!

Review.Titre: Súper Excited…
Review.Contenu: I am Super Excited with ESTAGE and Vick.  I been following all his instructions and recommendations. I had my share of frustrations as well, but it comes with the learning process. I am so thankful to Vick with his patience and also the support team who have helped me so much.  Thank you ESTAGE

Review.Titre: Success
Review.Contenu: The support of this team is second to none. They respond to my problems very quickly. If I still don’t understand they will do whatever it takes to get me the success I want. Thank you team success Estage

Review.Titre: I I Never had a Rolls Royce, but using Estage Feels like One!
Review.Contenu: I have worked with a few other platforms before and was ok with them. When I started using Estage, then I realized how stressful it was with the others. It is not just easy, but you don't have to worry if it will come out unexpectedly with any task. I have already built 3 websites with it. It is flawless, fast, and beautiful to work with, and recommend it to anyone who is non-techy like myself. Never had to install a plugin or work with code. It just works and is totally fun to be creative!

Review.Titre: I Love Estage! A New Innovative Webpage Builder
Review.Contenu: I love the new Estage webpage builder – the ease of use, webpages are beautiful, fast loading and secure.  Create funnels on your own website.You can build your webpage from scratch or use a template from the template library. The header and footer are easy to adjust. The drag and drop editor allows you to adjust the blocks and columns with ease. You can globally or manually set your color scheme, button sizes and font. Save your favorite blocks for reuse. And there are a selection of block dividers.The responsive options from desktop to tablet to mobile are easy to adjust.Add elements without plug-ins, forms, built in SEO feature, build your own pop-up modal.  There is a built-in blog and more.The times that I needed some extra help it was easy to contact customer service without going through a whole lot of digital prompts. They were very responsive and fast.

Review.Titre: Looking into the Future
Review.Contenu: ESTAGE is an amazing company with a great vision for the future! I feel like it is helping people evolve to a new level of forward thinking and technology. I am grateful to join and be a part of this exciting new journey to level up my relationships, business stucture, strategy and finances.

Review.Titre: Baby Boomer in Business
Review.Contenu: For a baby boomer with no tech education, I have found Estage to be a God send. My website looks so professional. I was able to get my business up and running very quickly. I feel the education and support from Vick, Nigel and the rest of the Four Percent support team has been phenomenal. I love this tribe and stand by this awesome product.

Review.Titre: very fast and simply
Review.Contenu: very fast and simply. No other tool like this will be found anywhere else, even a 7-year-old will be able to make a stunning website because of its simplicity and powerful tools. Very much recommended.

Review.Titre: Go to the ESTAGE experts at once!
Review.Contenu: My LIVE page has a replay button which is not performing the action even though I believe that I set it properly. For two (2) days I tried figuring out what was wrong but I can't find it. Finally, I sent a ticket to support for help. It was Nigel who received my ticket and was fixed right away! Lightning fast! I should have spared myself with two days of unnecessary anxiety if I only sought the experts soonest! Salute to all the ESTAGE experts! I am very delighted to be served by Nigel! Thank you, Success Team! You are all manifesting your Greatness!

Review.Contenu: If you're looking for...* an outstanding company (trustworthy/credible)* an experienced mentor (one who walks his talk)* a vision that consistently & contagiously inspires you* strategies & skillsets grounded in timeless methodologies...then you have to align with Vick & his team at eStage, they're simply AMAZING!!! An ethical team, with honesty & transparency at their core. Incredible customer support, & a collective team vision that delivers the highest quality information, tools, products, services & collaborations.If you're truly looking for freedom & control of your business, then eStage is THE platform that will open doors that you don't yet even know exist. Simplistic & intuitive...it's here to stay the distance!

Review.Contenu: It took ESTAGE to get me started in an online business. This is where I started to really dig in because it has the best, the latest, and the greatest to help you build a business online. The courses, the tools, the education period as well as the system set up all around just make you feel like you are in a different world, it is incredible. Who would not want to take advantage of this fantastic origin in time or space? A system that works this well is a place for every one of us, young and old. It's going to alter your life, your family's life, your friends, and the world. And this is the starting point for you, and believe me, you want to step onto this path to freedom.

Review.Contenu: I really love Estage. I love the flexibility, the ease with which you can create the most stunning web sites ever. Estage is SO MUCH FUN! The few times I have needed to contact support they have helped in such a friendly, knowledgeable, and time-sensitive way.

I wouldn't use anything else!
